page.title: 11SCHOOL IN CUMBERNAULD - 1
page.content: My school is called ST. Francis of Assisi.It is a primary school, which means it takes children from 5 to 12 years of age.Our school{like many in {our town of Cumbernauld is quite new.} In fact our school is the newest and is about 4 years old.All of the other schools in the town have been built in the last 25 years except Cumbernauld Village School,which is still in the original building in the old village. Our school building is different from other primaries in the town because it only has 7 classrooms,and the others usually have at least 14 rooms.The size of schools is becoming smaller because pupils are becoming fewer.The number of primary school pupils has reduced so much that in the past few years {2 primary schools have had to {close}although the buildings were new.
